ai-tha-ap292:1.2_0: One gone forth is not seeking,
ai-tha-ap292:1.3_0: I was the leader of them.
ai-tha-ap292:2.1_0: let alone rebirth in this or that state,
ai-tha-ap292:3.1_0: with defilements ended and flaws purged:
ai-tha-ap292:3.4_0: if they lie down on a bedorned storm.
ai-tha-ap292:4.2_0: there is no way to give up.
ai-tha-ap292:4.4_0: you must stay on the road to the gods.
ai-tha-ap292:5.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap292:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap292:5.4_0: this is the fruit of perception.
ai-tha-ap292:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Screams.
ai-tha-ap292:8.1_0: This for the tenth Elder Nun Previously
ai-tha-ap292:9.1_0: The group of thirty-two on the thirty-two rainy season
ai-tha-ap292:11.3_0: I served the Buddhist community of the homes
ai-tha-ap292:11.4_0: the going forth of the Buddha, the Lord.
